description:
Your purchase of Epic Quest and Excalibur brings joy to those in need & helps preserve pinball culture. 70% of the purchase price less VAT will be donated to Project Pinball Charity (United States 46-3417202) and The Budapest Pinball Museum (Hungary MK/20980/2013). This means Zen will donate 100% of our proceeds.

Project Pinball: The Project Pinball Charity Group, Inc. is a non-profit organization that places pinball machines in Children’s Hospitals, Ronald McDonald Houses, and Assisted Living Facilities to provide recreational relief to patients, family members, and hospital staff. 

Budapest Pinball Museum: The museum - by now with over 160 pinball and arcade machines - has opened its doors in Budapest on April 10, 2014. The Museum is considered to be Europe’s biggest interactive pinball museum in continuous operation. The machines exhibited in the museum span the entire history of the game from the 1800s to date.
name: Pinball FX - Charity Pack
